statements: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';

SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM articles GROUP BY author;

SELECT author, MIN(id) FROM articles GROUP BY author;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY title ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE topic = 'Technology';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM articles WHERE topic = 'Science';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith' AND topic = 'Health';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT MAX(publication_date) FROM articles;
SELECT MIN(publication_date) FROM articles;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT topic, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY topic;
SELECT author, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM articles WHERE topic = 'Science';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%' GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, topic, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author, topic HAVING total_articles > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT topic FROM articles;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles WHERE publication_date < '2022-09-01' GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication FROM articles GROUP BY author;

SELECT title, author FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_name FROM publications WHERE publisher = 'ABC Publishers';
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM scholarly_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT publication_name, publisher FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith' AND publication_date = '2021-02-15';

SELECT publication_id, publication_name FROM publications WHERE publisher IS NOT NULL;

SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publisher = 'XYZ Publishers';
SELECT article_id, title FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author = 'Jane Doe' AND publication_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM scholarly_articles;
SELECT title, author FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_name LIKE '%Journal%';
SELECT publication_name, publisher FROM publications WHERE publisher IS NULL;
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM scholarly_articles WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' AND author LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT publication_name, publisher FROM publications WHERE publication_date < '2019-01-01' AND publisher IS NOT NULL;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT publication_id, publication_name FROM publications ORDER BY publication_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM scholarly_articles;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM scholarly_articles;
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM publications;
SELECT AVG(article_id) AS avg_article_id FROM scholarly_articles;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT publisher) AS unique_publishers FROM publications;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM scholarly_articles GROUP BY author;
SELECT article_id, title, publication_name FROM scholarly_articles JOIN publications ON scholarly_articles.article_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM scholarly_articles WHERE publication_date = (SELECT MAX(publication_date) FROM scholarly_articles);
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT publication_title, published_date FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 100;
SELECT title, author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT article_id, author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, publication_title FROM articles JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT article_id, author_name, publication_title FROM articles JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, COUNT(publication_id) AS total_publications FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, AVG(citation_count) AS avg_citations FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, MAX(citation_count) AS max_citations FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, MIN(citation_count) AS min_citations FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, SUM(citation_count) AS total_citations FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name AS author, publication_title, published_date FROM publications JOIN authors ON publications.publication_id = authors.author_id WHERE citation_count > 50;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM articles INNER JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT article_id, title, author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT * FROM articles LEFT JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT * FROM articles RIGHT JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT * FROM articles FULL JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT * FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name JOIN publications ON publications.citation_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author IN (SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE affiliation='University');
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'Alice' OR author = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY article_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles;
SELECT author, AVG(citation_count) AS avg_citation_count FROM articles JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id GROUP BY author;
SELECT publication_title, AVG(citation_count) AS avg_citation_count FROM publications GROUP BY publication_title HAVING AVG(citation_count) > 50;
SELECT author_name, MAX(citation_count) AS max_citation_count FROM authors JOIN articles ON authors.author_name = articles.author GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(article_count) FROM (SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author));
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' AND article_id IN (SELECT article_id FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 50);
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM authors LEFT JOIN articles ON authors.author_name = articles.author GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_type FROM publications;
SELECT * FROM article_authors;
SELECT article_id, author_id FROM article_authors;

SELECT articles.title, articles.author, authors.email FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN authors ON article_authors.author_id = authors.author_id;

SELECT articles.title AS article_title, authors.author_name AS author_name, publications.publication_title AS publication_title FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN authors ON article_authors.author_id = authors.author_id JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id;

SELECT articles.title, authors.author_name, publications.publication_title, publications.published_date FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN authors ON article_authors.author_id = authors.author_id JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE affiliation IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_type = 'Journal';
SELECT articles.title, COUNT(article_authors.author_id) AS author_count FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id GROUP BY articles.title;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_authors.article_id) AS article_count FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name;

SELECT author_name, publication_type, COUNT(article_authors.article_id) AS article_count FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id JOIN articles ON article_authors.article_id = articles.article_id JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id GROUP BY author_name, publication_type;

SELECT articles.article_id, authors.author_name, publications.publication_title FROM articles LEFT JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id LEFT JOIN authors ON article_authors.author_id = authors.author_id LEFT JOIN publications ON articles.article_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM articles;
SELECT MIN(publication_date) AS earliest_publication_date FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT publication_title, publication_type FROM publications WHERE published_date < '2020-12-31';
SELECT articles.title, authors.author_name FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id;
SELECT article_id, COUNT(author_id) AS num_authors FROM article_authors GROUP BY article_id HAVING COUNT(author_id) > 2;
SELECT author_name, publication_title FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id JOIN articles ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, publications.publication_title FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id JOIN articles ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN publications ON publications.publication_id = articles.article_id;
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM articles;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_id) AS num_articles FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
SELECT AVG(article_id) AS avg_articles_per_author FROM article_authors;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM articles LIMIT 5;

SELECT author_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS num_publications FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id JOIN articles ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT article_id, publication_title FROM articles LEFT JOIN publications ON articles.publication_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT author_name, publication_title FROM authors FULL JOIN publications ON authors.author_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT article_id, publication_title FROM articles RIGHT JOIN publications ON articles.publication_id = publications.publication_id;
SELECT DISTINCT publication_type FROM publications;

SELECT author_name, publication_type FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id JOIN articles ON articles.article_id = article_authors.article_id JOIN publications ON publications.publication_id = articles.article_id;
SELECT publication_title, published_date FROM publications ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT author_name, SUM(article_id) AS total_articles FROM authors JOIN article_authors ON authors.author_id = article_authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_articles DESC;

SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles;
SELECT author, COUNT(article_id) AS num_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author;

SELECT author_name FROM authors;

SELECT journal_name, publisher FROM journals;
SELECT * FROM citations;
SELECT citing_article_id, cited_article_id FROM citations;
SELECT * FROM keywords;
SELECT keyword FROM keywords;

SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE affiliation='University XYZ';
SELECT journal_name, publisher FROM journals WHERE publisher='Publisher ABC';
SELECT article_id, title, author, publish_date FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND publish_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS num_articles FROM articles;
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM articles LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(journal_id) AS num_journals FROM journals;
SELECT MIN(publish_date) AS earliest_publish_date FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT journal_name, publisher FROM journals WHERE publisher LIKE 'Penguin%'
SELECT article_id, title, publish_date FROM articles WHERE author = (SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1)
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_name = articles.author
SELECT journal_name, publisher FROM journals WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM articles WHERE articles.author = authors.author_name)
SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_id) AS num_articles FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_name = articles.author GROUP BY author_name
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles LEFT JOIN citations ON articles.article_id = citations.cited_article_id
SELECT * FROM articles INNER JOIN keywords ON articles.article_id = keywords.keyword_id
